actions.description: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Greatclub

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

traits.description: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.
traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
